question:
In context with the Shilpotsav-2019 conducted in November in Delhi, consider the following statements:
  1. It is an initiative of the tourism ministry.
  2. The Shilpotsav showcases handicrafts of only tribal artisans.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Shilpotsav is an initiative of the ministry of social justice and empowerment. The apex bodies of the ministry that are involved in this annual fair are National Backward Classes Finance & Development Corporation (NBCFDC), National Handicapped Finance & Development Corporation (NHFDC), National Safai Karamchari Finance & Development Corporation (NSKFDC), National Scheduled Caste Finance & Development Corporation (NSFDC) and National Trust. Â Statement 2 is incorrect: The Shilpotsav involves the participation of artisans from across the country. These artisans are from weaker sections of the society. The fair is an initiative to empower the marginalised and disadvantaged artisans every year. A range of products made of terracotta, jute, bamboo, leather, etc. are exhibited.
